name: Gunnar's Saga
description:
The game follows the story of Gunnar, an old viking who wishes to enter Valhalla after his inevitable death. The norse Gods, however, will not grant that privilege easily: Gunnar will have to die a glorious death, crossing the nine world of the viking mythology and fight mighty creatures to impress the gods!

Features:

  • Enjoy an old school 2D platform game with intense and unique combat and EPICNESS mechanics.

  • Dive in the Norse folklore and face incredible creatures.

  • Use your axe and powers to accomplish great deeds, while avoiding silly traps and dangerous creatures.

  • Experience the incredible and funny tale of Gunnar, up to its epic end.

  • Defeat unique bosses and obtain divine powers.
